attributes.action: abort plans to widen the M11 close to resident's (voter's) homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the unnecessary expansion of Stansted Airport, the government are planning to widen the M11 on both sides of the motorway very close to residential housing between junctions 6 to 8.  The noise is already significant and two extra lanes would undoubtedly increase the noise, affecting quality of life.
